net.pandoragames.far.ui.model

Class AbstractFileRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.pandoragames.far.ui.model.AbstractFileRepository
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FileRepository

    public abstract class AbstractFileRepository
extends java.lang.Object
implements FileRepository
    Base class for FileRepository implementations that reference the find form and replace form models.
    Author:
    Olivier Wehner
